```coq
intros a l H.
assert (Hin : ~ In (a, 1) l).
{ intros Hc; apply H; exists 1; assumption. }
assert (Hadd : add_frequency_list a l = (a, 1) :: l).
{ induction l.
  - simpl; auto.
  - simpl; destruct (eqA_dec a b); subst; auto.
}
rewrite Hadd; simpl; left; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros a l H. assert (Hin : ~ In (a, 1) l). { intros Hc; apply H; exists 1; auto. } assert (Hadd : add_frequency_list a l = (a, 1) :: l). { induction l. - simpl; auto. - simpl; destruct (eqA_dec a b); subst; auto. } rewrite Hadd; simpl; left; auto.
